name: Kernel Panic
description:
Calling all fans of buttery deliciousness: it's time for Kernel Panic! Fan the flames with a tap to send your score popping higher and higher, but be careful! Fan those flames too much, and it's game over - nobody likes burnt popcorn, after all!

With addictive gameplay and a wide variety of achievements to unlock, Kernel Panic aims to satisfy your craving for a quick snack of gaming on the go. Kernel Panic even lets you share your high scores with your friends - but don't get salty if they beat you!
